# Preamble

## Dependencies

```{r load-libs, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(Rarr)
library(EBImage)
library(ggplot2)
library(jsonlite)
library(SpatialData)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
```

## Introduction

# `ImageArray`

## Constructor

```{r load-data}
path <- system.file("extdata", "blobs", package="SpatialData", mustWork=TRUE)
zarr <- file.path(path, "images", "blobs_image")

za <- read_zarr_array(file.path(zarr, "0"))
md <- fromJSON(file.path(zarr, ".zattrs"))
(ia <- ImageArray(za, md))
```

## `readImage`

```{r}
(ia <- readImage(zarr))
```

# `SpatialData`

```{r}
(spd <- readSpatialData(path))
```

## Accessors

`SpatialData` objects behave like a list, i.e.,
Elements can be accessed in various (equivalent) ways:

```{r results="hide"}
i <- "blobs_image"
element(spd, "images", i)
images(spd)[[i]]
image(spd, i)
spd$images[[i]]
```

```{r}
(img <- image(spd))
(lab <- label(spd))
```

# Visualization

```{r}
# utility for image plotting with 'EBImage'
.plot <- \(i) {
    c <- ifelse(
        length(dim(i)) == 3, 
        "Color", "Grayscale")
    j <- as.array(aperm(i))
    plot(Image(j/max(j), dim(j), c))
}
```

```{r plot-img}
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
.plot(img)
.plot(lab)
```

```{r}
(sce <- aggregateImage(spd))
cd <- data.frame(colData(sce), z=assay(sce)[1, ])
ggplot(cd, aes(x, y, col=z)) + geom_point() + 
  scale_color_viridis_c() + scale_y_reverse()
```

# Transformations

```{r}
path <- system.file("extdata", "raccoon", package="SpatialData", mustWork=TRUE)
(spd <- readSpatialData(path))
(i <- image(spd))
coords(i)
```

## `scaleImage`

```{r}
j <- scaleImage(i, c(1,1,2))
par(mfrow=c(1,2)); .plot(i); .plot(j)
```

## `rotateImage`

```{r}
j <- rotateImage(i, 30)
par(mfrow=c(1,2)); .plot(i); .plot(j)
```
